definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: city conquered by king of Assyr.;—´[[ס]] 2Ki 17:14, 2Ki 18:34 = [[סְפַוׇ֑יִם]] Is 36:19, [[עִיר סְפַרְוׇ֑יִם]] 2Ki 19:13 = Is 37:13; [[סְפַרְוׇ֑יִם]] also 2Ki 17:31 b Qr (Kt. [[ספרים]]); LXX Sepfarouain, Epfarouaim, etc., LXXL Sepfareim;—usu. identif. with Sippara (on a canal), between Bagdad and Babyl., a city in two parts, Sipp. of Samasû (mod. Abbu Habba), and Sipp. of Anunitu(m) on opp. side of canal, hence du. ´[[ס]] = the two Sipparas Schr:COT 2Ki 17:24, cf. Dl:Par 209–212 Tiele:Gesch. 88; this recently disputed, in view of mention with Hamath and other northern cities (2Ki 17:24 and esp. 2Ki 18:34), v. Hal:ZA ii. 401 ff. Di:Is 36:19 Wkl:Alttest, Unters. 101 Benz:2Ki 17:24 al., who cp. Šabara’ in city conquered by Šalmanašarid IV (Wkl in Schr:KB ii. 276); but this by no means certain.
